00024 struct MetaDataRecord {
00025     UINT8 m_mark_delete; 
00026     INT32 m_index;
00027     PathProfile m_resource_path_profile;
00028 #if defined(APOXI_INCLUDE_DRM)
00029     DrmInfoPersistStructure m_drm_info;
00030 #endif
00031     UINT32 m_size;
00032 
00033     MetaDataRecord();
00034     virtual ~MetaDataRecord();
00035 };

00041 class MetaData
00042 {
00043     public:
00044         MetaData();
00045 
00046         virtual ~MetaData();
00047 
00048 #if defined(APOXI_INCLUDE_DRM)
00049         void Init(const Path &path, const DrmInfo &drm_info = DrmInfo(), 
00050             UINT32 size = 0);
00051 #else
00052         void Init(const Path &path, UINT32 size = 0);
00053 #endif
00054 
00055         virtual MetaDataRecord& GetMetaDataRecord() = 0;
00056 
00058         virtual const MetaDataRecord& GetMetaDataRecord() const = 0;
00059 
00061         Path GetPath() const { return GetMetaDataRecord().m_resource_path_profile; }
00062 
00064         void SetPath(const Path &path) { path.WriteTo(GetMetaDataRecord().m_resource_path_profile); }
00065 
00066 #if defined(APOXI_INCLUDE_DRM)
00067 
00068         void GetDrmInfo(DrmInfo &drm_info) const { drm_info.ReadFrom(GetMetaDataRecord().m_drm_info); }
00069 
00071         void SetDrmInfo(const DrmInfo &drm_info) { drm_info.WriteTo(&GetMetaDataRecord().m_drm_info); }
00072 #endif
00073 
00075         UINT32 GetSize() const { return GetMetaDataRecord().m_size; }
00076 
00078         void SetSize(UINT32 size) { GetMetaDataRecord().m_size = size; }
00079 
00081         MimeType GetMimeType() const { return GetPath().GetMimeType(); }
00082 
00084         virtual WString GetInfoText() const;
00085 
00087         void SetDisplayedName(const WString &displayed_name) {  m_displayed_name = displayed_name; }
00088 
00090         const WString& GetDisplayedName() const { return m_displayed_name; }
00091 
00092         void SetMarkDelete(BOOLEAN mark_delete);
00093 
00094         BOOLEAN GetMarkDelete() const { return GetMetaDataRecord().m_mark_delete; }
00095

00097
